question: Abba Kyari, who recently passed away due to Covid-19, was the Chief of Staff of which African countryâ€™s President?
explanation:
The Chief of Staff of the President of Nigeria, Abba Kyari, recently passed away, after contracting the novel coronavirus.
Abbu Kyari was considered as one of the most powerful personnel in the country and he was also the top official advisor to the Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari. The spokesperson of the President confirmed his death.
